question_text: Which of the following may cause poor video quality when using a built-in laptop camera? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Obstructed lens from a privacy shutter
High CPU usage from background apps
correct_answer: Obstructed lens from a privacy shutter
High CPU usage from background apps
explanation: Several factors can affect webcam performance, including lighting, hardware limitations, lens obstructions, and system resource load.
